Title: Relates to requiring motor vehicle dealers to search for recalls and make certain repairs prior to selling a used motor vehicle
Summary: Requires motor vehicle dealers to search for recalls and make certain repairs prior to selling a used motor vehicle.
LawCode: Add ยง198-d, amd ยง199, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring motor vehicle dealers to search for recalls and make certain repairs prior to selling a used motor vehicle
